contest-event.event-date:
June 30, 1856 D Enderby Jackson's Hull Contest
Enderby Jackson's Hull Contest 0 Set Test and Own Choice
enderby-jackson-s-contest-at-hull-zoolog-1139
None
The Yorkshire Waltzes
Zoological Gardens, Hull, Yorkshire, England, UK See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc42.htm http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc17.htm
21 bands entered. Entry fee: 10s.
Prizes: 1st: £10 2nd: £5 3rd: £3
30 June 1856 Band Contest - Zoological Gardens, Hull A band contest took place at the Zoological Gardens, Hull, on Monday last. Smith's Leeds Band carried off the first prize; Black Dike Mill Band, the second prize; and the Batley Band, the third prize.
July 18, 2011, 1 p.m. Feb. 7, 2020, 12:09 p.m.

2 Black Dyke Band Samuel Longbottom Giulietta e Romeo [Vaccai, unknown arranger]
